name: My First Songs 2
synopsis: My First Songs 2 is the best interactive music game for kids, with a playlist of 14 popular children’s songs, charming 3D animations, and lots of cute characters and animals! Sing along and pop bubble notes: try to catch them all! Playlist: - Head Shoulders Knees and Toes - Deck the Hall - Ten Little Indians - Hey Diddle Diddle - Humpty Dumpty - If You’re Happy and You Know It - Little Miss Muffet - Pop Goes the Weasel - Row, Row, Row Your Boat - The Muffin Man - The Wheel on the Bus - We Wish You A Merry Christmas - Little Bo Peep - Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone
